Title: ASP.NET Blog | Forwarded Headers Middleware Updates in .NET Core 3.0 preview 6
Description: With the ASP.NET Core 2.1 release, we included UseHsts and UseHttpRedirection by default. These methods put a site into an infinite loop if deployed to an Azure Linux App Service, Azure Linux virtual machine (VM), or behind any other reverse proxy besides IIS.

Title: Hidden gems in ASP.Core and .NET Core 3.0
Description:
You've likely heard about the headline features in .NET Core 3.0 including Blazor, gRPC, and Windows desktop app support, but what else is there?

This is a big release so come and see David Fowler and Damian Edwards from the .NET Core team showcase their favorite new features you probably haven't heard about in this demo-packed session.
